properties.entry: SELECT BK_NO , BK_NAME , AUTHOR , BK_MAIN_IMG FROM TB_BOOK WHERE BK_NO = ?

SELECT BK_NO , BK_NAME , AUTHOR , PUBLISHER , BK_PUBLISH_DATE , BK_DIVISION , BK_GENRE , BK_ORIGIN_PRICE , BK_PRICE , BK_DESCRIPTION , AT_DESCRIPTION , BK_CONTENT_LIST , BK_MAIN_IMG FROM TB_BOOK JOIN TB_IMAGE ON(BK_NO = BK_NO_IMG) WHERE BK_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NO , BK_NO_IMG , IMG_PATH FROM TB_IMAGE WHERE BK_NO_IMG = ?
SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BK_NO , BK_HITS , RPAD(SUBSTR(BK_NAME, 1, 14), 20, ' ') BK_NAME , RPAD(SUBSTR(AUTHOR, 1, 14), 17, ' ') AUTHOR , BK_DIVISION , BK_GENRE , BK_PRICE , BK_MAIN_IMG FROM TB_BOOK ORDER BY BK_HITS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM between 1 and 20
